languages.text: "И вы не пожалеете о нашей дружбе, шерин! Пусть я еще и не торговый представитель Империума, но все же кое-чем помочь сумею. Наверняка у вас есть кто-то на примете, с кем стоит наладить отношения. Строгие {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцы{/g}? Горячие головы-пираты? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Нужно лишь подобрать правильные слова — как ключ к замку. И люди откроют вам свои души. Или кошельки. Ну а я все устрою, только скажите".

traits.locale_text: "И вы не пожалеете о нашей дружбе, шерин! Пусть я еще и не торговый представитель Империума, но все же кое-чем помочь сумею. Наверняка у вас есть кто-то на примете, с кем стоит наладить отношения. Строгие {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцы{/g}? Горячие головы-пираты? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Нужно лишь подобрать правильные слова — как ключ к замку. И люди откроют вам свои души. Или кошельки. Ну а я все устрою, только скажите".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."
languages.original_text: "И вы не пожалеете о нашей дружбе, шерин! Пусть я еще и не торговый представитель Империума, но все же кое-чем помочь сумею. Наверняка у вас есть кто-то на примете, с кем стоит наладить отношения. Строгие {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианцы{/g}? Горячие головы-пираты? {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Нужно лишь подобрать правильные слова — как ключ к замку. И люди откроют вам свои души. Или кошельки. Ну а я все устрою, только скажите".

The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? traits.locale_text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我们之间的友谊绝不会令你失望，亲爱的！或许我目前还不是帝国的正式贸易代表，但我依然可以帮助你解决一切你想解决的问题。你肯定希望能与某个派系建立联系吧？比如说，严肃的{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}？或是脾气暴躁的{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}海盗？只要采取正确的谈话方式，就像钥匙插进锁里那样，人们就会对你敞开心扉，或是敞开他们的钱包。这一切我都可以替你安排，你只要开口就好。”
languages.original_text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: “我们之间的友谊绝不会令你失望，亲爱的！或许我目前还不是帝国的正式贸易代表，但我依然可以帮助你解决一切你想解决的问题。你肯定希望能与某个派系建立联系吧？比如说，严肃的{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}圣德鲁苏斯教派{/g}？或是脾气暴躁的{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}海盗？只要采取正确的谈话方式，就像钥匙插进锁里那样，人们就会对你敞开心扉，或是敞开他们的钱包。这一切我都可以替你安排，你只要开口就好。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Y no tendrá ninguna queja sobre nuestra amistad, shereen! Puede que aún no sea una representante comercial del Imperium, pero aún puedo ayudar{mf|le|la} con lo que necesite. Seguro que hay una facción con la que le gustaría establecer una relación favorable, ¿verdad? ¿Los adustos {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusianos{/g}? ¿Los osados piratas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Solo tiene que decir las palabras correctas, como una llave para una cerradura, y la gente abrirá su corazón para usted. O su cartera. Yo me encargaré de todo: solo tiene que pedirlo».
languages.original_text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: «¡Y no tendrá ninguna queja sobre nuestra amistad, shereen! Puede que aún no sea una representante comercial del Imperium, pero aún puedo ayudar{mf|le|la} con lo que necesite. Seguro que hay una facción con la que le gustaría establecer una relación favorable, ¿verdad? ¿Los adustos {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusianos{/g}? ¿Los osados piratas de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Solo tiene que decir las palabras correctas, como una llave para una cerradura, y la gente abrirá su corazón para usted. O su cartera. Yo me encargaré de todo: solo tiene que pedirlo».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「陛下もこの友情には文句ないでしょう、シャリーン！今すぐには帝国の貿易担当者になれないかもだけど、お望みなら何だって手を貸すわ。関係を持ちたい派閥だってあるんでしょう？厳格な{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルシアン{/g}？短気な宇宙海賊の{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}？錠前に合う鍵を選ぶようなものよ。正しい言葉選びをするだけで心を開いてくれる。お財布もね。お願いひとつであたしが全部手配してあげるわ」
languages.original_text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下もこの友情には文句ないでしょう、シャリーン！今すぐには帝国の貿易担当者になれないかもだけど、お望みなら何だって手を貸すわ。関係を持ちたい派閥だってあるんでしょう？厳格な{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルシアン{/g}？短気な宇宙海賊の{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}？錠前に合う鍵を選ぶようなものよ。正しい言葉選びをするだけで心を開いてくれる。お財布もね。お願いひとつであたしが全部手配してあげるわ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Et vous n'aurez pas à vous plaindre de la nôtre, shereen ! Je ne suis pas encore la représentante commerciale officielle de l'Imperium, mais je peux tout de même vous être utile. Il y a sûrement une faction avec laquelle vous aimeriez entrer en relation. Les austères {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusiens{/g}, peut-être ? Ou bien les redoutables pirates de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ? À chaque verrou la clé qui lui correspond ; il suffit de savoir choisir les bons mots pour que les gens vous ouvrent leur cœur. Ou mieux encore, leur bourse. Je peux tout arranger, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire. »
languages.original_text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: « Et vous n'aurez pas à vous plaindre de la nôtre, shereen ! Je ne suis pas encore la représentante commerciale officielle de l'Imperium, mais je peux tout de même vous être utile. Il y a sûrement une faction avec laquelle vous aimeriez entrer en relation. Les austères {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusiens{/g}, peut-être ? Ou bien les redoutables pirates de la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} ? À chaque verrou la clé qui lui correspond ; il suffit de savoir choisir les bons mots pour que les gens vous ouvrent leur cœur. Ou mieux encore, leur bourse. Je peux tout arranger, vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Und Ihr werdet keinen Anlass zu Beschwerden über unsere Freundschaft haben, Shereen! Noch bin ich zwar keine Handelsrepräsentantin des Imperiums, aber ich kann Euch dennoch bei allem helfen, was Ihr benötigt. Habt Ihr vielleicht eine Gruppierung im Sinn, mit der Ihr gerne Beziehungen aufnehmen würdet? Die gefürchteten {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}? Die heißblütigen Piraten der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Mit den richtigen Worten öffnen die Leute wie mit einem Schlüssel bei einem Schloss ihr Herz für Euch. Oder ihre Geldbörsen. Ich werde alles arrangieren, Ihr müsst nur fragen."
languages.original_text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: Und Ihr werdet keinen Anlass zu Beschwerden über unsere Freundschaft haben, Shereen! Noch bin ich zwar keine Handelsrepräsentantin des Imperiums, aber ich kann Euch dennoch bei allem helfen, was Ihr benötigt. Habt Ihr vielleicht eine Gruppierung im Sinn, mit der Ihr gerne Beziehungen aufnehmen würdet? Die gefürchteten {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}? Die heißblütigen Piraten der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? Mit den richtigen Worten öffnen die Leute wie mit einem Schlüssel bei einem Schloss ihr Herz für Euch. Oder ihre Geldbörsen. Ich werde alles arrangieren, Ihr müsst nur fragen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Ayrıca arkadaşlığımızdan hiçbir şikâyetin de olmayacak şirinim! Henüz İmparatorluk'un ticaret temsilcilerinden biri olmayabilirim ama yine de her ihtiyacında sana yardımcı olabilirim. Aklında çalışmak, görüşmek istediğin birileri vardır mutlaka. Haşin {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçular{/g} ya da asabi {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} korsanları mesela? Doğru sözcükleri kullanınca anahtarla kilit açarcasına insanlar da sana kendi kalplerini açıyor. Cüzdanlarını da. Her şeyi ayarlayabilirim, istemen yeterli."
languages.original_text: "And you will have no complaints about our friendship, shereen! I may not be a trade representative of the Imperium just yet, but I can still help you with whatever you need. You must have some faction in mind that you would like to establish relations with? The severe {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusians{/g}? The hot-headed pirates of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}? You merely need to use the right words, like a key for a lock, and people will open their hearts to you. Or their wallets. I will arrange everything, you merely have to ask."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca arkadaşlığımızdan hiçbir şikâyetin de olmayacak şirinim! Henüz İmparatorluk'un ticaret temsilcilerinden biri olmayabilirim ama yine de her ihtiyacında sana yardımcı olabilirim. Aklında ilişki kurmak istediğin bir grup vardır mutlaka. Haşin {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drususçular{/g} ya da asabi {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} korsanları olabilir mi mesela? Doğru sözcükleri kullanınca, anahtarla kilit açarcasına insanlar da sana kendi kalplerini açıyor. Cüzdanlarını da. Her şeyi ayarlayabilirim; istemen yeterli."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
